actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide for the appointment of the Director of the National Park Service, and for other purposes.
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate

summary.text: Requires the Director of the National Park Service to be appointed by the President, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the appointment of the Director of the National Park Service, and for other purposes.
